title: 父亲的愤怒让我胆战心惊

conversations.english: My father’s angry face always makes my blood run cold.
conversations.chinese: 我父亲愤怒的时候总是让我胆战心惊。
conversations.reply_english: You mean that he is bad-tempered and often gets angry with you.
conversations.reply_chinese: 你的意思是他脾气很暴躁，经常对你发火。

title: 你能想象一只船沉入水里吗

conversations.english: Can you imagine a boat letting in the river?
conversations.chinese: 你能想象一只船沉入水里吗？
conversations.reply_english: That would be terrible.
conversations.reply_chinese: 那太可怕了。

conversations.english: Thanks for helping me up.
conversations.chinese: 谢谢你扶我起来。
conversations.reply_english: Are you OK? I didn't mean to put you in danger.
conversations.reply_chinese: 你还好吗？我不是故意要把你带入险境。

conversations.english: Oh, no. It looks like we're late.
conversations.chinese: 糟糕。看来我们迟到了.
conversations.reply_english: Let's just sit in the back. We can still hear the service from here.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我们坐后面就好了。这里还是听得到整个仪式。

conversations.english: It may comfort you to know that many people attended his viewing.
conversations.chinese: 今天有很多人出席他的遗容瞻仰，这点或许能让你感到宽慰些。
conversations.reply_english: How did they hear? No one called.
conversations.reply_chinese: 他们是如何得知的？没人打电话来。

conversations.english: I'm scared that she might not come back.
conversations.chinese: 我担心她可能不回来了。
conversations.reply_english: No,I don't think she's that strong-minded.
conversations.reply_chinese: 不会的，她的意志没有那么坚强。

conversations.english: Hello. I was wondering if Taylor Smith has checked out yet?
conversations.chinese: 喂。我想请问泰勒史密斯出院了没？
conversations.reply_english: Just one moment. I'll check with the cancer ward desk.
conversations.reply_chinese: 稍等。我问问癌症病房服务台。

conversations.english: Hi, Daniel, how are you holding up? I am greatly sorry for your loss.
conversations.chinese: Daniel，你是怎么样熬过来的？对你失去亲人，我感到很难过。
conversations.reply_english: Thank you, I’m doing much better. I’ve begun organizing everything for the funeral.
conversations.reply_chinese: 谢谢，我现在能较好地处理，我开始为葬礼做准备。

conversations.english: You know, Taylor's been in the hospital for a couple of days.
conversations.chinese: 你知道吗，泰勒已经住院好几天了。
conversations.reply_english: And I'm the one who put him there with my football moves.
conversations.reply_chinese: 而我正是那位没接好美式足球，害他住院的人。

conversations.english: I don't know what to say. This can't be happening. Here's the obituary.
conversations.chinese: 我不知道该说什么。这不可能是真的。讣闻在这里。
conversations.reply_english: It's really there? This all seems so surreal-like it's all one big nightmare.
conversations.reply_chinese: 真的有注销来？这一点都不像是真的——这简直是场天大的恶梦.

title: 我最好的朋友他却走了

conversations.english: I'm sorry, ladies. Mr. Smith's viewing is over. It ended an hour ago.
conversations.chinese: 女士们，很抱歉。史密斯先生的遗容瞻仰已经在一小时前结束了。
conversations.reply_english: But we just drove across town. Can't we just go in to see him one last...
conversations.reply_chinese: 但我们才刚大老远开车过来。我们能不能进去见他最后一……

conversations.english: Lisa wins the first prize in the English speech contest of her college.
conversations.chinese: 利萨在她大学里的英语口语竞赛中得了第一名。
conversations.reply_english: Really? That's really wonderful. I'm so happy for her.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是吗？那真是太棒了。我真为她感到高兴。

conversations.english: Jenny, what's wrong with you? Why do you keep weeping like that?
conversations.chinese: Jenny，你怎么啦？你为什么一直这样哭泣。
conversations.reply_english: Mary told me that she had seen you with John last night. I got to know the fact that you are playing the field.
conversations.reply_chinese: Mary说她昨天看到你跟Joan约会，我终于知道你是个花心大萝卜了。

conversations.english: Harry is so down that he won't talk to anyone.
conversations.chinese: 哈利好沮丧，不和任何人说话。
conversations.reply_english: I know only too well what that's like.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我很能知道那种感受。

conversations.english: I'm going for a walk, Yi-jun. I need some time to myself.
conversations.chinese: 我要去走一走，怡君。我需要独处一下。
conversations.reply_english: Don't you want to go to the visiting hours? This sheet says they are tonight.
conversations.reply_chinese: 你不想去致哀吗？这单子说在今晚。

conversations.english: Don't cover up your sadness. Let it go.
conversations.chinese: 不要掩饰你的悲伤，哭出来吧。
conversations.reply_english: I'm sorry.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我很难过。

conversations.english: Doris, I'm glad you're home. I'm terrified. I don't know what to do!
conversations.chinese: 桃乐丝，真高兴你回来了。我好害怕，我不知道该怎么办。
conversations.reply_english: What is it? What happened?
conversations.reply_chinese: 怎么了？发生什么事？

conversations.english: He followed me all the way home!
conversations.chinese: 回家的路上他都跟着我。
conversations.reply_english: That's about five blocks. And around corners too.So he was definitely following you.
conversations.reply_chinese: 大约距离五条街，也在转角附近。所以他绝对是跟踪你。

conversations.english: Look out!
conversations.chinese: 小心！
conversations.reply_english: What's it?
conversations.reply_chinese: 什么事？

conversations.english: I'm worried sick that she might leave me one day.
conversations.chinese: 想到有一天她要离开我,我真担心死了.
conversations.reply_english: I'll teach you how to keep her.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我教你怎么留住她.

conversations.english: You know, I am really nervouse flying these days.
conversations.chinese: 你知道吗，我最近坐飞机都很紧张。
conversations.reply_english: Really! Security has improved a lot, don't you think?
conversations.reply_chinese: 真的吗，飞机安全跟以前比起来进步大多了，你不觉得吗？

conversations.english: Eddie, why are we at this scary-looking mansion? It’s like, ultra spooky!
conversations.chinese: Eddie，我们为什么要呆在这座吓人的别墅里呢？它看起来很吓人。
conversations.reply_english: I told you already, Shabby, the owner of the house says there is a ghost haunting his house so we have to go in and investigate.
conversations.reply_chinese: Shabby，我已经告诉过你了。房子的主人说屋子里有鬼出现，所以我们必须进来调查。

conversations.english: Oh, no! Now I'll be late.
conversations.chinese: 糟了！快迟到了。
conversations.reply_english: Can I give you a hand?
conversations.reply_chinese: 要我帮忙吗？
